creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: square ruined structure with archways; ruined doorway at left; goats in foreground and and left; scattered figures--some with staffs, woman with goats in middle ground

title: The Temple of Janus and the So-called Arch of the Moneychangers
